name: Spațiu Mioritic 03
description:
Spațiu Mioritic(RO) / Mioritic Space (EN): Lucian Blaga’s (poet and philosopher) concept of the Mioritic Space is a philosophical explanation that defines the Romanian spiritual universe represented by the Romanian geographic space: the land where the mountains and the valleys alternate and create a perfect environment for shepherding. He considered the Romanian soul in solidarity with this spatial horizon.
This is the 3rd photo of this series. The photo of the two sheperd dogs was taken in the spring of 2019 in Maramureș County, Northern Romania.
Nicole Marton, Instagram: @m.art.on & Twitter: @AnielaMarton
